title: Something Matching
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Maki, look at these! These earrings are so cool! They have demon wings on them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>They do seem like something you would like, Yoshiko.... But aren’t these angel wings?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>No, they’re definitely demon wings! Fufu, I think I’ll buy these~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>What about you, Maki? Did you find any accessories that you liked?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hmm, I was thinking of getting a pair of earrings too, but I don’t know which to get....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Then how about buying these demon wings ones too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eeh, why should I!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I’ve been wanting to get something matching with you for a while, Maki.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Something matching.... I guess I’ll also get them then....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Really!? Then let’s put them on right away afterward. I’ll take a picture and show them off to everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
